title: Mark Cuban
summary: Mark Cuban (born July 31, 1958)[2] is an American billionaire entrepreneur, television personality, and media proprietor whose net worth is an estimated $4.3 billion, according to Forbes, and ranked #177 on the 2020 Forbes 400 list.[3] He is the owner of the Dallas Mavericks professional basketball team of the National Basketball Association (NBA),[4] co-owner of 2929 Entertainment, and chairman of AXS TV.[5] He is also one of the main "shark" investors on the ABC reality television series Shark Tank.[6]
